message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I believe the product could be useful, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. Could you do $9,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be worth the investment.

Hello Alice, I understand your perspective and I appreciate your confidence in the product. However, based on my budget constraints, I can only consider offers up to $8,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
